name: Amy Butler Cosmo Bag - fresh spring colors!
description:
This bag is made using Amy Butler's Peacock Feathers in Sea Glass on the exterior and Laurel Dots in pink for the bands, handles and lining. It measures 21" across at its widest point, 14-1/4" across the bottom, 22-1/2" tall (with handles) and 4" deep. I used woven interfacing to give the bag stability and shape. There are two exterior pockets on either side and four interior pockets across the width of the bag. It closes with a 1-1/2" pink button. 

This tote is great for carrying your computer and lunch to work, toting a change of clothes to the gym, shopping, shopping at the market, or going to the beach. 

All fabrics are 100% cotton and washable. Made in my smoke free home.

name: Beach Bag or Large Tote - Pretty Bird
description:
This large tote is made using Pretty Bird fabric, with shades of lime green, turqoise, and hot pink. It is constructed with heavy stabilizer and batting as well as plastic in the bottom to give it alot of shape and stability. It is top stitched around the top and along the seam to give it a nice finish.

Measuring 26" wide at the top, 13" wide at the bottom, 16" high and 7" deep, it is large enough to use as a beach bag, to carry groceries, to transport your laptop and lunch to work, as a carry-on, etc.

Made of 100% cotton. It can be machine washed on delicate and line dryed, then pressed with a cool iron if needed. All items are made in my smoke-free home.

name: Quilted Pillow - Sanctuary by Patty Young
description:
This pillow cover is pieced in a mosaic pattern using various fabrics from the Sanctuary Collection by Patty Young. The colors are turquoise, grey, and green. The cover is quilted in a wavy pattern using grey thread. It has an envelope closure in the back that is trimmed with binding for a nice finish. It fits a 20" square pillow form (not included).

Size 20" square
100% cotton fabric, batting and thread
Made in my smoke free home
Machine wash cool, line dry, iron with a warm iron

name: Magical Lands Baby/Child Quilt
description:
This fresh, modern quilt is made using fabrics from the Magical Lands collection by Saffron Craig, inspired by her native home of Australia. 

Measuring 46" square, it is perfect for a crib blanket, play mat, or wall hanging.

This lightweight quilt is machine pieced and hand quilted with traditional white thread around the center block, and with green Perle cotton thread around the perimeter blocks. In the center panel, the hills are also outline quilted. The binding is double machine stitched on the front and hand stitched on the back for extra durability. 

The back is also pieced, making the quilt reversible. 

Made by me in my smoke free home of 100 percent cotton fabric, thread and batting. Can be machine washed and dried. This quilt has been laundrered to give it that crinkly, cuddly effect.

This would make a precious baby gift.

name: Peacock Lane Quilt
description:
This quilt is pieced using fabrics from the Peacock Lane collection by Violet Craft. I fussy cut the beautiful fabric and framed it in kona grey cotton to accentuate the beautiful trees, elephants, and peacocks in the pattern. Colors are yellow, turquoise, green, and red. 

It is machine quilted in a stippled pattern. The binding is a patchwork of the various fabrics. It is machine stitched on the front and hand stitched on the back. 

This quilt measures 62" wide by 75" long. It can be machine washed on cold and tumbled dry, but I prefer to line dry my quilts. It can be used as a throw or will fit a twin sized bed with a dust ruffle. Please measure your bed first to avoid disappointment.

It is made in my smoke free home using 100% cotton fabrics, Warm and Natural batting, and cotton thread.
